message: Barreling down the hallway, we find our path blocked by three black-clothed men.

name: ミンク
message: "Guess I'll have to deal with this."
Mink greets the men running toward us with his fists.

name: クリア
message: "Why?! I want to stay with Master!"
Mink grabs Clear by the back of the collar and pulls him to his side. His eyes bore into mine, demanding a response.
